rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, exile the top card of your library. If its mana value is less than that creature's, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't cast it, this enchantment deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: [i]“Hi! Welcome to the junkyard of the multiverse—you're lucky, it's a slow day!”[/i]
